Room.Name: At the base of a mountain
Room.Description: You stand at the base of a rocky mountain. Harsh wind buffets you as it sweeps in from above and a howling of some terrible force echoes from somewhere on the other side.

Room.Name: On a rocky mountain
Room.Description: The rocks here are jagged and sharp, threatening you as if seeking your blood. As you ascend the outcrop, the winds become stronger, almost blasing you off your feet. Thunder clouds roll perpetually overhead, looming with dark secrets. You can climb higher up onto the mountain, or descend back down the path.

Room.Name: On a rocky mountain
Room.Description: The rocks here are jagged and sharp, threatining at you as if seeking your blood. As you ascend the outcrop, the winds become stronger, almost blasting you off your feet. Thunder clouds perpetually roll overhead, looming with dark secrets. You can climb higher up onto the mountain, or descend back down the path.

Room.Name: On a ledge on a high mountain
Room.Description: You find yourself at the top of a mountain upon a wide ledge overlooking a blighted wasteland. Darkness cloaks most of the land, obscuring your view of it, but what you see is enough to make you shiver in fear.

Room.Name: On a ledge on a high mountain
Room.Description: You walk along a wide ledge overlooking a blighted wasteland. Darkness cloaks most of the land, obsuring your view of it, but what you see is enough make you shiver in fear.

Room.Name: On a ledge on a high mountain
Room.Description: You find yourself at the top of a mountain upon on a wide ledge overlooking a blighted wasteland. Darkness cloaks most of the land, obsuring your view of it, but what you see is enough make you shiver in fear. A ledge heads west around the mountain or you can descend it on a path going down.

Room.Name: On a rocky mountain
Room.Description: You find yourself halfway up a steep rock mountain. Chill winds blow harshly against you and a thick evil mist hangs in the air. Below you and to the east a small valley can be seen, while above you the mountain leads up.

Room.Name: At the base of a mountain
Room.Description: You are at the base of a mountain inside a small enclosed valley. Mist hangs heavily in the air, blocking out much of the light and making the entire region seem as if it is in perpetual night. To the east you can just make out what look like buildings, although no lights are on. The only other way out if a mountain path up.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. To the east you make out the vague shapes of buildings hidden in the mists that hang over the valley. West of you only mountains can be seen.

Room.Name: Outside a desolate town in a misty valley
Room.Description: You reach the outskirts of a seemingly dead town. Literally dead. A signpost has fallen over at the side of the road but little else can be seen of the town through the heavy mist that hangs in the air.

ExtraDescription.Description: A broken, weathered signpost reads: Welcome to Haven, all races welcome except orcs and orckin. Please enjoy your stay!

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permanant feature, like the strange mists that hand over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear a faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues east and west and a small building of some sort lies to the north.

Room.Name: In a collapsed building
Room.Description: This small structure has long since ceased to be habitable. Broken furniture and shattered glass still lie hazardously on the floor, uncleaned by whoever used to live here. Strangely enough there is no sign of animals, no nests or feces or food remains... The only way out is to the south again.

Room.Name: At an accursed common square in a misty town.
Room.Description: You have arrived at a wide open space littered with dozens of crosses upon which withered, desicated corpses hang crucified in some horrific ritual. Around you the mists seem thicker and more sentient, as if growing with a lif e of it's own. To the the north the town road leads out of the square, while the main road passes through east and west. A building to the south appears to be some old administration service.

ExtraDescription.Description: The well is badly cracked and all dried up. There doesn't seem to be much demand for water around here anyway.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permanant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear a faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues east and west and a small building of some sort lies to the south.

Room.Name: In a burnt out house
Room.Description: This house has been gutted by a fire long ago. Nothing but charred remains are here and it won't be long before even those have been carrried away by the wind and rain. The exit leads north back to the road.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permenant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear the faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues east and west and a small building of some sort lies north.

Room.Name: In a blocked up room
Room.Description: This room looks like a big fight occured in it. Chairs and beds lie near the doors as if they had been used to block the entrances. Whoever it had been obviously lost because the state of the building, and the town, do not indicate the living occupants had any success.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permenant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear the faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues east and west and buildings of some sort lie north and south.

Room.Name: In a blocked up room
Room.Description: This room looks like a big fight occured in it. Chairs and beds lie near the doors as if they had been used to block the entrances. Whoever it had been obviously lost because the state of the building, and the town, do not indicate the living occupants had any success.

Room.Name: In a blocked up room
Room.Description: This room looks like a big fight occured in it. Chairs and beds lie near the doors as if they had been used to block the entrances. Whoever it had been obviously lost because the state of the building, and the town, do not indicate the living occupants had any success.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permenant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear the faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permenant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear the faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues north and south.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permenant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear the faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road continues north and south and to the east you see a badly kept building.

Room.Name: Inside a badly kept building
Room.Description: To say this building was badly kept is really a bit euphemistic. The entire room has collapsed in and the floor is buckled and broken. You doubt anyone has lived here for a very long time. The only way out is back west.

Room.Name: On a town road covered by mist
Room.Description: You walk through a seemingly dead town. The darkness here is like some permenant feature, like the strange mists that hang over the entire valley. Somewhere nearby you think you hear the faint scraping of what sounds like feet. The road leads out of the town to the north or into it south.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Mist hangs heavily in the air blocking out much of the light and making it seem like perpetual night covers the valley. To the south you can make out the vague outlines of some buildings, while to the east and west the road branches off into the mists.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Mist hangs heavily in the air blocking out much of the light and making it seem like perpetual night covers the valley. To the east and west the road wanders off into the mists.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Mist hangs heavily in the air blocking out much of the light and making it seem like perpetual night covers the valley. To the north and west the road wanders off into the mists.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Mist hangs heavily in the air blocking out much of the light and making it seem like perpetual night covers the valley. To the north you hear the faint sounds of water bubbling. South of you the road continues into the mists.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. The only way from this place is back west.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. You can go east or west along the lakes banks.

Room.Name: At the edge of a black lake
Room.Description: You find yourself standing before a lake of boiling, bubbling black acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. To the north lies a pier over the lake while the banks of the lake head east and west.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. The banks of the lake continue east and west.

Room.Name: On a pier over a black lake
Room.Description: Somehow this wooden pier has been magically maintained from the corrosive acids that make up the lake it overhangs. Boiling black acid spits up at you from below and you can imagine what falling into it would do... The pier continues east and south.

Room.Name: On a pier over a black lake
Room.Description: Somehow this wooden pier has been magically maintained from the corrosive acids that make up the lake it overhangs. Boiling black acid spits up at you from below and you can imagine what falling into it would do... The pier continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a pier over a black lake
Room.Description: Somehow this wooden pier has been magically maintained from the corrosive acids that make up the lake it overhangs. Boiling black acid spits up at you from below and you can imagine what falling into it would do... The pier continues east and west.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. Some large heavy rocks block the way north around the lake and the banks head back to the east.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. Some large heavy rocks block the way south around the lake while the way west lies unhindered.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. The banks continue east and west.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. The banks continue north and east around the lake.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. The banks continue north and south around the lake.

Room.Name: On the banks of a black lake
Room.Description: You stand on the edges of a lake of bubbling acid. What you thought was water gurgling softly from a distance was in fact some black acid boiling and bubbling in a huge lake. You hear the sounds of something huge to the east, while the banks continue back to the south.

Room.Name: The black dragon's wading pool
Room.Description: You've wandered into the relaxation room of an ancient black dragon. Acid etched bones and rocks are about all you can make out from the sizzling acid that spits through the air.

Room.Name: A burnt out reception room
Room.Description: This looks like it was once the recepetion room for the town hall. Now it's just a burnt out husk with no roof and no floor to really speak of. The only exit is back east.

Room.Name: Inside a collapsed hallway
Room.Description: You stand inside what was once the foyer to a townhall. Now nothing but rain and wind frequent the place. A burnt room lies west or you can go north to the main road or south into this old building.

Room.Name: In a collapsed room
Room.Description: The walls and cieling seem to have caved in on this room. You seriously doubt it was like this when first built. The remains of a meal are on the ground, the first and only signs of life in the village you have seen so far.

Room.Name: In a gutted hallway
Room.Description: The hall of this old townhall leaves a lot to be desired in the way of upkeep. Burnt wooden frames and corroded steel make of most of it. The rest is just dirty walls and leaking roofs. To the west is a small side room while the hall itself continues north and east.

Room.Name: In a gutted hallway
Room.Description: The hall of this old townhall leaves a lot to be desired in the way of upkeep. Burnt wooden frames and corroded steel make up most of it. The rest is just dirty walls and leaking roofs. The hall continues west and east.

Room.Name: In a gutted hallway
Room.Description: The hall of this old townhall leaves a lot to be desired in the way of upkeep. Burnt wooden frames and corroded steel make up most of it. The rest is just dirty walls and leaking roofs. A door is in the south wall while the hall itself continues east and west.

Room.Name: Outside a desolate town in a misty valley
Room.Description: You reach the outskirts of a seemingly dead town. Literally dead. A signpost has fallen over at the side of the road but little else can be seen of the town through the heavy mist that hangs in the air.

ExtraDescription.Description: A broken, weathered signpost reads: Welcome to Haven, all races welcome except orcs and orckin. Please enjoy your stay!

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. To the west you make out the vague shapes of buildings hidden in the mists that hang over the valley. The road continues south and west.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. To the north and west you make out the vague shapes of buildings hidden in the mists that hang over the valley. East of you only mountains can be seen, rising high into the mists.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Around you mountains rise up into the msits. The road continues easterly into the mountains or west towards what look like the shapes of buildings.

Room.Name: At the base of a mountain
Room.Description: You find yourself at the base of a mountain that disappears into the low hanging mists. An old unused road leads west away from it or a rocky path ascends upwards into the darkness.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: Mist covers the path like a thick blanket, preventing you from seeing more than a few feet. Chill winds sweep over you as you climb higher and higher.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: Mist covers the path like a thick blanket, preventing you from seeing more than a few feet. Chill winds sweep over you as you climb higher and higher.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded ledge
Room.Description: You find yourself standing upon a narrow, hazardous ledge high in the air. Mist swirls all around you, making it difficult to see where to stand. Perhaps it is best you can't see the long drop down though. A heavy rock has been placed on the path leading upwards for some reason. The ledge heads east while a path on the mountain face goes and down.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: Mist covers the path like a thick blanket, preventing you from seeing more than a few feet. A soft blanket of snowy has accumulated along the ridge and chill winds sweep over you as you climb higher and higher.

Room.Name: On a snowy mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: Mist covers the path like a thick blanket, preventing you from seeing more than a few feet. The snow is thicker here and ice hangs from the rocks as the cold air condenses even the moisture in your breathe. A chill winds sweeps over you as you climb higher and higher.

Room.Name: On a snowy mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: At the point in the mountains the clouds hang low around you, forming a veil of mist and dew. The snow is thick here and ice hangs from the rocks as the cold air condenses even the moisture in your breathe. A chill winds sweeps over you as you climb higher and higher.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded ledge
Room.Description: You find yourself standing upon a narrow, hazardous ledge high in the air. Mist swirls all around you, making it difficult to see where to stand. Perhaps it is best you can't see the long drop down though. A heavy rock has been placed on the path leading upwards for some reason. The ledge heads west while a path on the mountain face goes and down.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: Mist covers the path like a thick blanket, preventing you from seeing more than a few feet. Chill winds sweep over you as you climb.

Room.Name: On a mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: Mist covers the path like a thick blanket, preventing you from seeing more than a few feet. Chill winds sweep over you as you climb higher and higher.

Room.Name: In a gutted hallway
Room.Description: The hall of this townhall leaves a lot to be desired in the way of upkeep. Burnt wooden frames and corroded steel make up the most of it. The rest is just dirty walls and leaking roofs. You see doors to both the south and east, while the hallway leads back west.

Room.Name: The mayor's office
Room.Description: This was once the town mayor's office. Now it's just a cumbling room filled with mist and dust.

Room.Name: A collapsed workroom
Room.Description: This must have been some mages workroom prior to the events that destroyed this town. Now it's just a ruined room with more glass than most. The room continues east or a door leads out north to the hallway.

Room.Name: A collapsed workroom
Room.Description: This must have been some mages workroom prior to the events that destroyed this town. Now it's just a ruined room with more glass than most. The room continues west or a door leads out north to the hallway.

Room.Name: A clearing in a the dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: A small clearing in the mountains is here. Nothing but darkness seems to live here. The only visible exit is back north.

Room.Name: On a snowy mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: At the point in the mountains the clouds hang low around you, forming a veil of mist and dew. The snow is thick here and ice hangs from the rocks as the cold air condenses even the moisture in your breathe. A chill winds sweeps over you as you climb higher and higher. A narrow, hazardous ledge leads west around the mountain or the path heads down.

Room.Name: On an ice-covered ledge
Room.Description: Ice has formed hard slippery layers on the floor of this narrow ledge. The way is dangerous and cold with only a plummet to the cold rocks far below as any visible incentive. The ledge continues south and east around the mountain.

Room.Name: On an ice-covered ledge
Room.Description: Ice has formed hard slippery layers on the floor of this narrow ledge. The way is dangerous and cold with only a plummet to the cold rocks far below as any visible incentive. To the west the ledge opens up to a snowbound part of the mountainside. The ledge itself goes north.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Exit.Description: The snowy ground narrows onto a ledge.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: An snowbound mountainside
Room.Description: You find yourself trudging knee-deep in snow as you navigate the freezing mountainside. All around you is white snow and shattered ice. In the distance you hear something's roar echo through the mountain.

Room.Name: The lair of the white dragon
Room.Description: You stand in a large iced-over clearing of rocks. Snow lies thickly over everything, covering up most, but not all, of the bones that lie scattered around. Something huge lives here, something huge and very cold.

Room.Name: At the end of a pier over the black lake
Room.Description: You stand at the end of the pier but mist hangs heavily over the lake blocking most of the view. It is from here that Charon the boatkeeper takes some the lost souls to hell and you had best not interfere with any of the ghostly avatars he sends to conduct his work here.

Room.Name: On an unused road in a misty valley
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Mist hangs heavily in the air blocking out much of the light and making it seem like perpetual night covers the valley. The roadway leads east and west.

Room.Name: At a gate in the misty road
Room.Description: You walk along a dirty old road that looks as if it hasn't been used for a long, long time. Mist hangs heavily in the air blocking out much of the light and making it seem like perpetual night covers the valley. Finally you stumble into a broken, rusty gate that hangs loosely in the wind. On the other side the mist hangs even more heavily and all you can see is a dark open area with large moving shapes within it. The road itself leads back east while the clearing opens out to the west.

Room.Name: Lost in a misty field
Room.Description: These fields span an incredible area. They must've been once used for the town crops and animals, but now they are blighted and rocky. The mist embraces you with a cold chill as if trying to absorb you into the eternal devestation of the land. All around you shapes move decadently in the shadows.

Room.Name: Lost in a misty field
Room.Description: These fields span an incredible area. They must've been once used for the town crops and animals, but now they are blighted and rocky. The mist embraces you with a cold chill as if trying to absorb you into the eternal devestation of the land. All around you shapes move decadently in the shadows.

Room.Description: These fields span an incredible area. They must've been once used for the town crops and animals, but now they are blighted and rocky. The mist embraces you with a cold chill as if trying to absorb you into the eternal devestation of the land. All around you shapes move decadently in the shadows.

The mist embraces you with a cold chill as if trying to absorb you into the eternal devestation of the land. All around you shapes move decadently in the shadows.

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Your light flickers and dies, only to flare again. Somehow even the shadows themselves seem to be getting darker.

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance... The tunnel has hit a dead end here and the only way back is west.

Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Name: A small underground pool
Room.Description: You stumble out into a broad open cavern. Some of your light shines on a pool of water that lies here stagnant and uninviting. On closer inspection you realise that the water isn't actually water but thinned out blood that's seeped from the ceiling and walls to form a sticky wet puddle.

Room.Name: In a dimly lit tunnel
Room.Description: Dull yellow lamps provide light in the tunnel. Around you dwarves scurry past in hurried perperation for some coming battle. To the north and south are small rooms and the tunnel heads east and west.

Room.Name: A dimly lit tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel here has been lit by some weak lamps. To the west you can hear the sounds of people working in a hurry. East of you a part of the tunnel seems to have been collapsed in order to cover up this part of the tunnel.

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: You have come to a dead-end in the tunnels. The west wall seems to have been collapsed and buried as if on purpose. It doesn't seem all that solidly bloacked though. Other than that nothing but darkness surrounds you.

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance...

Room.Name: A pitch-black tunnel
Room.Description: Shadows flicker about you in the haze of your light and receeding echoes haunt your steps. The darkness encloses you in a cold embrace and only the sounds of your own breathing are here to keep you company...or is that a scraping sound you hear in the distance... A faint breeze is coming from the south.

Room.Name: In a darkened tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel here is very dark and quiet. To the north the darkness is complete with the tunnel disappearing into it. South of you some light can be seen coming from a hole in the roof.

Room.Name: Beneath a hole
Room.Description: You stand beneath a hole in the ground. North of you some darkened tunnels stretch out into northingness, while up above the sky is shadowy and overcast.

Room.Name: Outside a dark cave
Room.Description: You stand at the end of a rocky pathway through high shadowy mountains. A dark cave leads into the ground here, but light doesn't seem to penetrate more than a few metres. From the east a howl of great anguish and loss rides in on the chill winds. The path leads east into the mountain range or you can go down into the cave.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage continues east and west.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage leads north and west.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage continues north and south.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage continues east and south.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage continues north and west.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage continues east and south.

Room.Name: At the base of a mountain in a dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. Dark clouds and thick mists overhang the entire area, making it hard to see what is to come. The passage heads west or you can go up into the moutains.

Room.Name: At the base of a mist enshrouded mountain
Room.Description: You stumble down into the base of a tall mountain enshrouded in dark mists. Howling winds sweep down upon you, chilling you to the soul. To the east a darkened pathway leads through the mountains while a rough trail heads up into the moutains.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. On the ground small pools of dark liquid have accumulated and congealed. At a second glance you realise it is blood and that the drops are quite recent; it almost seems as if someone has been dragged through here. A soft moaning sound comes from the south while the passage continues east to even darker regions or west towards a large mountain.

Room.Name: A bend in the dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. On the ground small pools of dark liquid have accumulated and congealed. At a second glance you realise it is blood and that the drops are quite recent; it almost seems as if someone has been dragged through here. Some statues of huge demonic beings have been erected here. Life size busts of many greater demons such as Orcus and Demogorgon line the pathway. The passage bends around the moutains here and heads south to some large structure or west to a large mountain.

Room.Name: A dark rocky pathway
Room.Description: The path through the mountains is subdued and darkened. On the ground small pools of dark liquid have accumulated and congealed. At a second glance you realise it is blood and that the drops are quite recent; it almost seems as if someone has been dragged through here. To the south you can see a small structure of some sort in the rocks. Statues of evil beings both well known to you and unrecognisable line the path. The passage continues north and south.

Room.Name: Before the bone gates
Room.Description: The pathway through the mountains ends here at a huge set of gates made of bone. A pair of huge arching spines constitute the frame of the gate while blackened and charred plates of over-lapping demon bone cascade down to fill in the gate's body. It is beyond comprehension what could sort of creature could have had such bones. The path leads north into the mountains, while trough the gateway you can hear faint sounds of demonic laughter....

Room.Name: Entrance to the courtyards
Room.Description: You stand at the entrance to a long courtyard. Strangely enough no lights are provided, the only ones being your own. A great gate of bone lies to the north.

ExtraDescription.Description: A pair of huge arching spines constitute the frame of the gate while blackened and charred plates of over-lapping demon bone cascade down to fill in the gate's body

Room.Name: Northwest corner of a courtyard
Room.Description: Darkness encroaches all around you and it is only your own light that shatters the shadows that prey on your sanity. Demonic screams resound all around you. The courtyard seem more like the entrance to hell than a castle.

Room.Name: Northern end of courtyard
Room.Description: Darkness encroaches all around you and it is only your own light that shatters the shadows that prey on your sanity. Demonic screams resound all around you. The courtyard seem more like the entrance to hell than a castle. To the north you see a massive gate, all other directions lead further into the courts.

Room.Description: Darkness encroaches all around you and it is only your own light that shatters the shadows that prey on your sanity. Demonic screams resound all around you. The courtyard seem more like the entrance to hell than a castle. To the south you see an alcove containing a set of stairs leading up.

Room.Name: Southeastern corner of a courtyard
Room.Description: Darkness encroaches all around you and it is only your own light that shatters the shadows that prey on your sanity. Demonic screams resound all around you. The courtyard seem more like the entrance to hell than a castle.

Room.Name: Below a staircase
Room.Description: Darkness encroaches all around you and it is only your own light that shatters the shadows that prey on your sanity. Demonic screams resound all around you. A stair case ascends into the keep, although the screams of agony that you can hear do not sound very inviting.

Room.Name: Top of the northwest battlement tower
Room.Description: You stand on a tower that has been upraised to help maintain watch over the surrounding mountains. The darkness that seems to perpetuate itself in everything arund here doesn't allow much to be seen though. It makes you wonder what sort of dark creature could possibly be fit for such guard duty.

Room.Name: On the northern battlements
Room.Description: You are walking on a thick stone battlement that surrounds the outer wall of the keep. The perpetual night blocks the surrounding mountains, making you wonder what sort of creature could possible stand watch in such darkness. A clicking, scraping sound can be heard approaching you...

Room.Name: On the northern battlements
Room.Description: You are walking on a thick stone battlement that surrounds the outer wall of the keep.
