Room.Name: Top of a stairwell
Room.Description: You are at the top of a staircase leading down. From all around you the sounds of pain and suffering can be heard, but it is from the northern doorway that it is most prevailent...

Room.Name: A small alcove in the torture chambers
Room.Description: A large rack used to rip the limbs off living victims has been placed in this corner. Blood is pooled on the table and a pair of torn-off arms lie discarded on the ground.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. To the west is a small alcove.

Room.Name: In The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. A black door with a skull carved into it leads south out of this room of depravity.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. To the east is a small alcove.

Room.Name: A small alcove in the torture chambers
Room.Description: A set of huge sharp steel spikes stand upright in the floor. Blood and shredded bits of flesh coat them all in liberal amounts, making you realise they are in frequent use.

Room.Name: A small alcove in the torture chambers
Room.Description: Chains rimmed with razor sharp edges hang from the ceiling and extend to the floor. The ripped up bodies of recently tortured victims dangle in bloody chunks.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. To the west is a small alcove.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. To the east is a small alcove.

Room.Name: A small alcove in the torture chambers
Room.Description: Some wierd complex device made to inflict mortal pain and suffering is here. Although liberal amounts of blood drip from it there is nobody currently in it.

Room.Name: A small alcove in the torture chambers
Room.Description: A pit full of glowing orange coals lies in the centre of this alcove. The smell of roasted flesh and burnt meat permeates the room.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. To the west is a small alcove while a black door with a skull carved into it lies north.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. An alcove lies in the north wall.

Room.Name: The torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. It seems that the acquisition of corpses to raise is more than just a butchers job, it's an art form here. To the east is a small alcove while a black door with a skull caraved in it lies north.

Room.Name: A small alcove in the torture chambers
Room.Description: A hole in the roof lets a dozen purple tentacles descend into the room, flailing about wildly as they seek out living flesh to devour. As they touch a dead body you watch in horror as acid spits and sizzles the dead meat.

Room.Name: A blood soaked workroom
Room.Description: Blood literally soaks this room. The walls, the floor, even the cieling are drenched in thick dripping red. Some horribly mutilated body parts lie discarded on the ground like some grotesque toys. Metal tools of various shapes and sizes line the walls ready for use on some poor victim. Many of them still have bits of flesh attached to them.

Room.Name: The end of the torture chambers
Room.Description: Devices of torture fill this room: devices ranging from simple thumb-screws to huge complex spiked mechanisms of some unknown purpose. Small demons run about frantically operating them all, bringing pain and suffering to the poor souls enslaved in this minor hell. A black door in the north wall poses your only obstacle in forging further past these chambers.

Room.Name: In a corpse filled room
Room.Description: This room looks like the garbage room: bodies lies mangled and discarded like broken toys and large boxes filled with hacked limbs line the wall. You think that some of the bodies, and maybe even some of the limbs, are not quite as dead as they should be...

Room.Name: Under a staircase
Room.Description: You are at the bottom of a winding staircsae leading up into god knows what. To the south you can hear the screams of great pain and suffering. A black door is in the southern wall.

Room.Name: At the top of a staircase
Room.Description: You are at the top of a winding staircase going down. Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has put a lot of time and resources into making this place appear rich and elegant.

Room.Name: At a corner in the corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads east and south.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. A side passage leads north to some stairs going down.

Room.Name: At a corner in the corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the alls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads south and west.

Room.Name: In a bare room
Room.Description: This room is bare. Nothing but black marble floors and walls. A door leads back east.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and south. There are doors in the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a desecrated room
Room.Description: Some kind of unholy shrine has been erected here. A dark altar of ebonite dominates the room and various unholy symbols are carved into a large pentagram on the floor. A door leads back west.

Room.Name: In a dark room
Room.Description: The darkness in here is total, as if someone was trying to avoid the light. A door leads back east.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and south. There are doors in the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a bare room
Room.Description: This room is bare. Nothing but black marble floor and walls. A door leads back west.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and south.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and south.

Room.Name: In a burnt out room
Room.Description: The furnishing of this room has been badly charred and scorched. Even the marble shows signs of cracking under some sort of intense heating. A door leads back east.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and south. There are doors in the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a bare room
Room.Description: This room is bare. Nothing but black marble floor and walls. A door leads back west

Room.Name: In a well well furnished room
Room.Description: Beautiful furnishings have been placed here for some occupant. Much of it contains iron and and adamantite, but you see no mithril, which is strange since mithril is far more prefered for rich furnishings. A door leads back east.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and south. There are doors in the east and west walls.

Room.Name: In a bare room
Room.Description: Racks of weapons and armor line the walls. A pile of dead hacked bodies lie strewn about the room, as if used for weapons practice. A door leads back west

Room.Name: At a corner in the corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and east.

Room.Name: In a corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads east and west while a side passage leads south to some stairs going up.

Room.Name: At a corner in the corridor
Room.Description: Black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of resources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The corridor heads north and west.

Room.Name: Below a staircase
Room.Description: You stand at the base of some winding stairs leading up while black marble floors and walls surround you in dark opulance. Along the walls carved statues of some demonic beings stare back at you. It looks like someone has placed a lot of rescources into making this place appear rich and elegant. The only way out if north into a corridor of black marble, or up the staircase.

Room.Name: On a small landing
Room.Description: Grotesque carnage greets you on this platform: twitching bodies lie hazzardly strewn about, many of them unrecognizable as anything you have ever seen before. Something or someone has slaughtered them. On closer inspection you realise they are more of the dark creatures of the keep, and someone has been killing them, someone very powerful.

Room.Name: On a small landing
Room.Description: The landing is littered with the corpses of unidentifiable creatures. Someone has been bust clearing a path through here for some reason. Above you a staircase winds up onto the keeps roof, while to the north something evil seems to be brooding.

Exit.Description: Something dark extinguishes all light you try to shine north.

Room.Name: Out on the roof
Room.Description: You are outside on the roof! With a gasp of relief you breathe in fresh air and smell the crisp cold. But before you can get too relieved a loud hiss erupts to the east of you further along the roof.

Room.Name: A broad open platform
Room.Description: This broad platform out on the roof has been built to accomodate the owner's horse. Or at least what passes as his horse.....

Room.Name: Antechamber to the shadowlord's room
Room.Description: This darkened room reminds you of a crypt. Nothing stirs, not even the wind, and even cries of agony and despair seem muted and far off. Statues of the many of the greater demons and devils of the Abyss' 666 layers have been erected here: Orcus, Demogorgon, Pazuzus, Asmodeus, Bael, Molok and others stare back at you with such intensity you feel yourself cringing. A landing lies south and to the east a door blocks the way but not the prescence of something unspeakable.

Room.Name: Inside the shadowlord's room
Room.Description: This room has been built to accomodate the supervisor of the project being conducted here. It is probably not a good idea to interrupt him, he is a busy devil after all...

Room.Name: On the northwestern battlements
Room.Description: You are walking on a thick stone battlement that surrounds the outer wall of the keep. The perpetual night blocks the surrounding mountains, making you wonder what sort of creature could possible stand watch in such darkness. A clicking, scraping sound can be heard approaching you...

Room.Name: A blocked passage way
Room.Description: This end of the tunnel has been carefully blocked off by debris and rocks. However, careful inspection shows that there are some parts of the cave block that appear moveable in the western part of the tunnel. Back to the east you hear the sounds of busy activity.

Room.Name: In a dimly lit room
Room.Description: Dull yellow lamps provide light to this room where dwarves hurry about in the frantic preperation for some coming battle. The only way out is to the south back to the tunnel.

Room.Name: In a dimly lit tunnel
Room.Description: Dull yellow lamps provide light in the tunnel. Around you dwarves scurry past in hurried perperation for some coming battle. To the north and south are small rooms and to the west the tunnel seems to end.

Room.Name: In a dimly lit room
Room.Description: The dim yellow lighting reveals barrels of ale and old food scraps. This is obviously used to provide nourishment to the busy dwarves as they rush about preparing for some fight. A door leads east, while to the south the tunnel awaits.

Room.Name: In a dimly lit tunnel
Room.Description: Dull yellow lamps provide light in the tunnel. Around you dwarves scurry past in hurried perperation for some coming battle. To the north is a side corridor, while the tunnel continues east and west.

Room.Name: The captains room
Room.Description: The captain of the dwarves appears to have set up a make-shift headquarters here. Maps showing battle plans and carefully prepared itinerarys are strewn all about. Seems like he's not much into neatness even if he does like to be meticulous. The door leads back west.

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: Large crates and boxes of unidentifiable materials and machinery are here. Dwarves scurry about trying to make it all come together. The only way out is back south.

Room.Name: A store room
Room.Description: Large crates and boxes of unidentifiable materials and machinery are here. Dwarves scurry about trying to make it all come together. The only way out is back north.

Room.Name: At a small campfire in the tunnels
Room.Description: A small campfire has been lit here, smoking out the room but providing light and warmth. Cooked meat and mugs of ale have been discarded after what looks like a filling meal. Around you the equipment of some adventurers has been piled against the walls, much of it of fine make but of little practical use to any not learned in the item's ways. The only visible exit is back north to the tunnels.

Room.Name: Lost in a misty field
Room.Description: These fields span an incredible area. They must've been once used for the town crops and animals, but now they are blighted and rocky. The mist embraces you with a cold chill as if trying to absorb you into the eternal devestation of the land. All around you shapes move decadently in the shadows.

Room.Name: Lost in a misty field
Room.Description: These fields span an incredible area. They must've been once used for the town crops and animals, but now they are blighted and rocky. The mist embraces you with a cold chill as if trying to absorb you into the eternal devestation of the land. All around you shapes move decadently in the shadows.

Room.Name: Outside a small farmhouse
Room.Description: You find youself in front of a run-down farmhouse. Most of the structure has collapsed in on itself but enough remains to provide a skeleton of a building. A creaky door to the south still hangs loosely from rusty hinges and leads into the structure. To the east only thick mists hiding a large open area can be seen.

Exit.Description: The doorway is hidden in shadows.

Room.Name: In a small farmhouse
Room.Description: This room in the farmhouse is filled with fallen timber and rusted metal. A rusty door swings loosely on the north wall and a gap in the wall leads west. To the south there appears to be some kind of backyard.

Room.Name: In a backyard of a farmhouse
Room.Description: This looks like it was used to hold dogs of some sort. probably sheep dog for helping to keep track of the farm animals. Right now it looks more like a rats home.

Room.Name: In the shephard's room
Room.Description: This appears to be the room of the town shephard. Not much here now..it's long since been abandoned..maybe. The large gap in the east wall is the only way back out.

NPC.name: skeleton warrior
NPC.description: Cracked and splintered bones have somehow knitted together to form an impossibly walking skeleton. Hollow eye sockets swivel around to stare in your direction.
NPC.longDescription: An impossibly living skeleton is here patrolling the battlements.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior Outdoors AssistVnum

NPC.name: nightwatcher devil
NPC.description: The very air around this unholy beast seems to darken. It has the physique of a powerful man but eyes of brilliant burning red glow malignantly from the head of a horned goat. It hisses softly, sending a steaming plume into the air then scrapes the ground with one of it's rock hard cloven feet.
NPC.longDescription: A huge creature with a goat's head and cloven feet guards the tower.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: girl elf victim
NPC.description: This young elf girl seems to be in mortal agony as her body slowly gets ripped up from the inside. A strange collar about her neck hums loudly as the wounds on her slim figure magically seem to heal up, allowing the pain to continue.
NPC.longDescription: A young elf screams and writhes in agony as her body is impaled on an iron spike.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea

NPC.name: devil christian
NPC.description: A powerfully built man with a goat's head makes gestures of hatred in your direction. It wants your soul, but cannot kill you of it's own volition without breaking it's pact with the gods; the souls of mortals cannot be forced by the Devil himself into Hell, not unless a pact is made first.
NPC.longDescription: A man with a goat's head and cloven feet watches you with unconcealed malice.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Undead Warrior Fade AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: demilich skull shadan
NPC.description: This is all that remains of one of the ancient liches that roam the material planes. It has moved on past needing all but the most basic of material forms and resides in a human skull while seeking to perfect it's powers. As one of the greater free-willed undead it seeks alliance with evil of similar capabilities in order to consolidate it's position.
NPC.longDescription: A human skull floats passively in the room.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden DetectGood Sanctuary ProtectionGood Flying DarkVision DetectIllusion PassDoor

NPC.name: nosferatu vampire
NPC.description: This stately looking man gives you a feeling of great unease. His appearance is one of affluence and riches, but his manner is one of depravity and evil. His dark brooding eyes are a stark contrast to his white, pale complexion.
NPC.longDescription: A finely dressed man with a pale complexion stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lich priestess
NPC.description: This major undead creature has been summoned to aid in the raising of minor creatures of the negative planes. Her ability is awesome and her will strong, but the one who has invoked her aid is stronger still and she has no choice but to do It's bidding. For now.
NPC.longDescription: A withered old crone points a gnarled finger at you and hisses.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Cleric AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood DarkVision DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor

NPC.name: paladin knight man
NPC.description: You gaze upon the last of the great paladins, the final one of those who quests to find the holy saangreal. Of the great circle of Arthur's court only Lancelot remains to complete the task. He has met many friends on his journeys and some of them now require his aid. For this reason he has come to these forsaken shadows and is preparing for a conflict he may not be able to win, but which he has vowed to fight.
NPC.longDescription: A man in beautiful armor contemplates the task ahead.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Rescue AssistAlign AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis Sanctuary ProtectionEvil DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: man torturer
NPC.description: This man spits and froths at the mouth as he hacks up bodies and limbs. The screams of agony around him seem to make him even more feverish as he goes about his bloody work.
NPC.longDescription: A wicked looking man slashes at you with razor-sharp claws!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior

NPC.name: deathknight karanth creature
NPC.description: When the divine fall they fall far. This creature was once a renowned paladin who fought for the immortals themselves. Yet even the truest of mortals can be corrupted and his time came. Now he resides as an major undead serving the darkness that seduced him with the promise of power and immortality.
NPC.longDescription: A creature wearing the armor of an outcast knight guards the way.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage Warrior

NPC.name: shadowlord undead
NPC.description: Nothing but pure darkness and glowing red eyes stare back at YOU!
NPC.longDescription: An undead of immense power attempts to devour your soul!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage Warrior

NPC.name: dracolich
NPC.description: This massive dracolich was once one of the greatest red dragons ever to live. In death the greater lords of darkness gathered it's form and used the most unholy of magics to animate the corpse into a new phase of existence. The mortal flesh was shed and only the skeletal form was presevered. It's mind was then gathered from the shadows and reinstituted into the new form, allowing It to once again walk the mortal planes as a major free-willed undead. Now it serves as It's lord's main form of transport, enjoying the privilages it gets from such a duty.
NPC.longDescription: The massive skeleton of an ancient dragon rises in fury!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary DarkVision DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor

NPC.name: human man
NPC.description: A human man makes gurgling screams as blood dribbles from his mouth and his arms are wrenched from their sockets. A strange collar about his neck hums loudly as the wounds on his bloody body magically seem to heal up, allowing the pain to continue.
NPC.longDescription: A man screams in agony as his body is torn apart.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea

NPC.name: gnome victim
NPC.description: A little gnome twists and thrashes in the air as razor-edged bits of chain swing him about the room. A strange collar about his neck hums loudly as the wounds on his body magically seem to heal up, allowing the pain to continue.
NPC.longDescription: A gnome jerks about on a razor-edged chain, slowly mincing his own body.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea

NPC.name: giant victim
NPC.description: This giant has been cooked mercilessly alive in a pit of coals. His skin bubbles and boils as the heat seers him alive. A strange collar about his neck hums loudly as the wounds on his bloody body magically seem to heal up, allowing the pain to continue.
NPC.longDescription: An giant body twitches as it burns and bubbles in the flames.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea

NPC.name: girl victim
NPC.description: A young girl is here being crushed to death by a huge purple tentacle. Blood sprays out her screaming mouth as internal organs are crushed. A strange collar about her neck hums loudly as the wounds on her tortured body magically seem to heal up, allowing the pain to continue.
NPC.longDescription: A girl writhes and spasms as a tentacle wraps around her body.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea

NPC.name: christian devil
NPC.description: A powerfully built man with a goat's head makes gestures of hatred in your direction. You sense it wants your soul, but cannot kill you of it's own volition without breaking it's pact with the gods. The souls of mortals cannot be forced by the Devil himself into Hell, not unless a pact is made first.
NPC.longDescription: A man with a goat's head and cloven feet watches you with unconcealed malice.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Undead Warrior Fade AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: dwarf
NPC.description: This dwarf seems to have been through hell. His body is torn and mangled beyond belief. It is amazing he is alive at all. In his trembling hand is a blood stained piece of wood that he was dipping in his own blood to write with.
NPC.longDescription: A dwarf cacked in drying blood lies limply on the ground.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior Outdoors

NPC.name: weeping zombie
NPC.description: This corpse seems to have gone through a large part of it's decaying process before someone got around to raising it from the dead. Yellow pussy fluids seep from open wounds on it's body.
NPC.longDescription: A grotesque corpse with weeping wounds rises up from the ground.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Undead Indoors

NPC.name: ghoul
NPC.description: A gaunt man with feverish eyes stumbles about seeking food...any food.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting man spits blood and flesh from it's mouth and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Undead Warrior Outdoors

NPC.name: ghoul
NPC.description: A gaunt man with feverish eyes stumbles about seeking food...any food.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting man spits blood and flesh from it's mouth and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Undead Warrior Outdoors

NPC.name: gargoyle
NPC.description: A stone gargoyle with a hideous visage watches you with unfeigned interest. You almost feel as if it's spying on you for someone...
NPC.longDescription: A gargoyle folds it's wings and observes your passage with glaring eyes.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Warrior Indoors
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: dwarf warrior
NPC.description: This well armored dwarf is scurrying about in the frenzy of pre-battle preperations.
NPC.longDescription: A dwarf prepares for the coming battles.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Warrior Outdoors AssistRace AssistVnum

NPC.name: dwarf priest
NPC.description: This little dwarf seems to have been in the ale a bit too much. Probably not a good idea to accept the blessings of a drunk cleric.
NPC.longDescription: A dwarf dresssed in clerical robes hickups as he bestows blessings.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Cleric Outdoors Healer AssistRace AssistVnum

NPC.name: dwarf captain
NPC.description: A tough looking dwarf flails his arms about as he tries to find those lost battle maps.
NPC.longDescription: A stout dwarf prepares for the coming battles.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Warrior Outdoors AreaAttack AssistRace AssistVnum

NPC.name: lich necromancer man
NPC.description: The town magi once was a powerful man and when the Nightfall overcame the valley he was corrupted into the form of a powerful free-willed undead lich.
NPC.longDescription: An emanciated old man turns burning red eyes upon you!
NPC.shortDescription: the lich of a damned man
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sanctuary DarkVision DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor

NPC.name: zombie man
NPC.description: This former occupant of the town failed to escape when the Nightfall descended, now he exists forever trapped in this hollow body.
NPC.longDescription: A decayed man with hollow eye sockets fills the room with hatred.
NPC.shortDescription: a zombie of a damned man
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Undead Warrior

NPC.name: zombie mayor
NPC.description: The mayor thought to stay and combat the darkness that fell upon his town, but it takes more than goodwill to overcome the eternal night. He fell in the Nightfall and now he exists as a shell of his former self.
NPC.longDescription: A crumbling body stands from it's chair and reaches for you hungrily.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Cleric Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: myrddraal captain
NPC.description: This myrddraal captain is a product of some sort of unholy experiment in creating a race of evil warriors. He is now on his way to the old Malkeri lands to take charge of the myddraals that wreak havoc in the blights.
NPC.longDescription: A hideous creature with black eyes screams and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary Infrared DarkVision DetectIllusion DetectInvis PassDoor

NPC.name: elf girl ranger leyara
NPC.description: Her long slim body and beautiful face are not to be mistaken for soft weakness for this girl is one of the finest elven rangers ever to walk Orthos. For services rendered to the good of her forest lands she was given a fine longbow strung with unicorn hairs. Now she travels with a group that is seeking to destroy an ancient evil across the far mountains.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful girl stares wistfully into a campfire.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Warrior Indoors AssistAlign
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil Sneak

NPC.name: belador dwarf cavalier
NPC.description: This dwarf is the leader of a group heading into the eastern mountains to defeat an ancient evil. His people have agreed to help him in his quest by preparing a raid on the lands at the same time, while one of his old friends, a mighty paladin, has agreed to meet him later to help. However his stomach is proving to be more important to him right now as the camp food gives him cramps.
NPC.longDescription: A stocky dwarf is here grumbling about his food.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Warrior Indoors AreaAttack AssistAlign

NPC.name: jarid man human mage
NPC.description: This man is one of the high archmages assigned to aiding the good of the land. He accompanies an elf and a dwarf on their quest to defeat an ancient evil that has shattered a nearby land. For him it's just another job, nothing more nothing less.
NPC.longDescription: A tall man in flowing white robes rests besides a campfire.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistAlign

NPC.name: anti antichrist man
NPC.description: The man seems asleep but as you look at him he murmmers, "The pleasure of pain, i enjoy this place of solitude". Suddenly his eyes flick open and burning red eyes stare back at YOU!
NPC.longDescription: A man wearing a crown of thorns has been nailed on an inverted cross.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: ghost crowd
NPC.description: The crowd seems to be made up of insubstantial ghosts. They all appear to be watching the scene around them as if acting out some macarbe play.
NPC.longDescription: Ghostly figures fade in and out of a large crowd that has gathered here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack Fade

NPC.name: warrior lich weaponmaster
NPC.description: You gaze upon the warrior lich weaponmaster, head teacher of the undead Arborian armies.
NPC.longDescription: A huge creature is here practising it's skills.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: black dragon
NPC.description: This old dragon was having a nice acid bath, and it's not pleased to see you!
NPC.longDescription: A huge black dragon rises up in a shower of acid!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior

NPC.name: drow assassin master
NPC.description: The drow master has come from the underdark to negotiate a better deal with the undead master of this area.
NPC.longDescription: A drow dressed in all black erupts from the shadows at you!
NPC.shortDescription: a drow grand master of assassins
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak Hide Haste

NPC.name: balron demon
NPC.description: Much like the balron that Gandalf fought in moria, and just as powerful.
NPC.longDescription: A huge flaming demon lashes at you with a fire-wreathed whip!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood DetectIllusion

NPC.name: white dragon
NPC.description: The white dragon is as old as the mountains themselves, and intends to stay that way.
NPC.longDescription: A white dragon shatters the ice encasing it as it rears up at you!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: fisherman zombie
NPC.description: This man was caught in the descending darkness while he was fishing. Now he remains forever sitting on the docks dangling his line for fish that will never come.
NPC.longDescription: A gaunt man with hollow eyes dangles a corroded fishing line in the acid.
NPC.shortDescription: the zombie of a town fisherman
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Undead Warrior

NPC.name: black sheep
NPC.description: Looks like one of the town animals that got caught in the Nightfall.
NPC.longDescription: A sheep with pure black wool hisses and spits acid at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Undead Indoors AssistRace

NPC.name: dog hound hellhound
NPC.description: This dog was chained to his post when Nightfall came. Now it remains forever locked up as an undead animal of it's former life.
NPC.longDescription: A huge hound wreathed in flames snaps at you!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: shephard man zombie
NPC.description: This is the town's old shephard who watched over the animals while the other men did the hunting and fishing. Seems he too was caught in the Nightfall.
NPC.longDescription: A decayed man shuffles towards you with outstretched arms.
NPC.shortDescription: the zombie of a town shephard
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Cleric Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: imp creature malefic
NPC.description: This litte scaly beast is the evil side of faeriekind. It seems intent on keeping all the torture devices it can in operation, and takes great delight in it's work.
NPC.longDescription: A gnarled little creature scurries about the room in ecstatic frenzy.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior Fade

NPC.name: imp creature
NPC.description: This little beast is one of the more evil kind of faeriekind that inhabit the lower planes of the abyss. It seems to be enjoying it's task of overlooking the operation and order of the torture devices of this keep.
NPC.longDescription: A gnarled litte creature runs around the chambers in ecstatic frenzy.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior Fade

NPC.name: guard undead skeleton remains
NPC.description: A powerful ancient king with rotten skin guards tha gate of Nightfall keep. His empty eye sockets glows blood-red and waves of horrible fear pass through your mind after you look at him. Summoned by a shadowlord from Realm of the Dead now he protect his masters from mortal intruders.
NPC.longDescription: A rotten remains of ancient warrior raising before you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood DarkVision DetectIllusion

Item.Name: iron longsword
Item.LongDescription: an ordinary looking iron longsword lies here unused.

ExtraDescription.Description: A fine longsword has been crafted from a piece of iron.

Item.Name: iron spear
Item.LongDescription: an long shaft if iron lies here unused.

ExtraDescription.Description: A piece of iron has been forged into a spear.

Item.Name: banner nightfall
Item.LongDescription: a banner bearing the symbol of an eclipsed sun is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This standard bears the symbol of an eclipsed moon. It is the mark of one of the greater demons of the Abyss and should not be taken lightly.

Item.Name: blood potion elven
Item.LongDescription: Some blood has condensed on the floor in a sticky puddle

ExtraDescription.Description: Some elf girl's blood has been spilled and congealed into a sticky mess.

Item.Name: collar enslavement
Item.LongDescription: a collar bearing the runes of pain and suffering lies waiting for a victim.

ExtraDescription.Description: Dark runes cover this steel collar. Pain and suffering are it's primary use, and the powerful magics bestowed upon it are designed to keep the victim alive for the maximum duration so as to allow the suffering to be prolonged.

Item.Name: demilich eye glow
Item.ShortDescription: the eternal glow of a demilich eye
Item.LongDescription: a dark red glow burns evilly on the floor.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Dark Evil NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: You see some faint motion within it as some unspeakable force idles inside it, waiting to be released. The eye is all that remains of one of Nel'Shadan's previous incarnations on the mortal planes.

Item.Name: black bone circlet
Item.LongDescription: a circlet of black bone lies rotting on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: A bit of a human skull has been sliced off from the demilich Nel'Shadan. Even in death it contains some of the immortal power of the ancient undead. Beware he who dares to control such power.

Item.Name: scimitar runed
Item.LongDescription: a steel scimitar woven with unholy runes lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic AntiGood NoRemove Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: A beautfully crafted scimitar has been engraved with the runes of Fear, Hate, Death, Darkness and pain.

Item.Name: band crystal
Item.LongDescription: a shimmering band of some strange dark crystal lies here.

Item.Name: ruby ring green
Item.LongDescription: an exquisite ring made of green ruby lies here.

Item.Name: mace demon head
Item.ShortDescription: a mace made from the head of a screaming demon
Item.LongDescription: an impaled demon's head lies here screaming in anguish.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: This mace has been forged by the most unholy means. A demon's head has been severed and by divine powers it lives on, screaming in anguish and loss as it is used as the basis of a demonic weapon. Only the most unholy and evil of heart can hope to control the power contained by it.

Item.Name: flesh tatters arm
Item.LongDescription: A pile of bloody tattered flesh moves horribly on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: These bits of ragged torn flesh seem to still be alive. The bloody tatters are woven together into what could be used as sleeves.
Bits of torn ragged flesh twitch and spasm with a life of their own.

Item.Name: sapphire collar
Item.LongDescription: a wide collar of pure sapphire lies on the ground.

Item.Name: pendant eternity
Item.ShortDescription: a pendant engraved with the word 'Eternity'
Item.LongDescription: a strange pendant rests on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: T his beautiful ivory and gold pendant was carved in the temple of Asgard by the immortals of honor and duty. It has the word 'Eternity' engraved on it to represent true honor and duty.

Item.Name: helm elysium
Item.LongDescription: a great helm of pure white almost seems to float in front of you.

Item.Name: plate armor elysium
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of elysium battle armor
Item.LongDescription: a suit of pure white armor lies here waiting for someone worthy.

Item.Name: arm armguard elysium
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of elysium arm guards
Item.LongDescription: some pure white armguards lie here waiting for someone worthy.

Item.Name: leggings elysium
Item.LongDescription: some pure white leggings lie here waiting for someone worthy.

Item.Name: bracelet tears
Item.ShortDescription: a bracelet carved from gold dragon tears
Item.LongDescription: some frozen tears have been carved into a bracelet.

ExtraDescription.Description: Some gold dragon tears have been frozen and carved into a bracelet.

Item.Name: sword forever
Item.LongDescription: a bastard sword of great power hums on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: After King Arthur's sword Excalibur was returned to the lake the gods forged a new blade of pure mithril. This blade was blessed 'Forever' in the name of friendship, and given to the last paladin of the holy grail, Sir Lancelot.

Item.Name: razor gloves
Item.LongDescription: a pair of gloves with razor sharp edges lie on the ground.

Item.Name: black longsword blade souls
Item.ShortDescription: a longsword forged from the souls of heaven's outcasts
Item.LongDescription: a blade of pitch-black seems to shimmer with life.

ExtraDescription.Description: The greater lords of the Abyss have gathered the souls of those who did not quite make it to Heaven and have punished them for their goodness by enslaving them in the eternal darkness of this blade. The deathknight Karanth was given the blade as honor of his service to the dark, and it is he who has held the coldness of the trapped souls until now.

Item.Name: plate armor outcast
Item.ShortDescription: platemail bearing the mark of an outcast knight
Item.LongDescription: a suit of tarnished armor with the symbol of a broken blade is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This battered armor has the symbol of a broken sword embossed on it. The deathknight Karanth was given it as punishment for his oathbreaking when he chose the path of corruption and evil in order to obtain immortality. He was forced to wear it until he obtained the unholy sa'angreal for the dark gods. Only then would his binding service to the shadowlords of the abyss be broken and his life once more his own to pursue.

Item.Name: signet ring
Item.LongDescription: a burning ring of metal lies here.

Item.Name: emblem insignia
Item.LongDescription: a dark emblem seems to exude an aura of darknesss.

Item.Name: shadow forsaken shift
Item.LongDescription: a shadow writhes and shifts about on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: The shadow of some powerful immortal being has been left here to face the light. It shifts and writhes about as it tries to hide in the darkness.

Item.Name: scroll necronomican parchment
Item.LongDescription: a piece of parchment lies here unobserved.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral

ExtraDescription.Description: A page of the undead necronomican has been torn out and lies waiting for someone to recite it. Only the darkest and most evil can hope to unleash even this small part of the undead book. Beware he who calls upon the dead.

Item.Name: dracolich claw
Item.LongDescription: The skeletal remains of some dragon claw lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The huge skeletal claw of a dead dragon has been severed. Part of it's powerful binding magics still remain and it hums sotfly with power.

Item.Name: dracolich spine coil
Item.LongDescription: a coil of some dragon's spine lies here thrumming softly.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is the severed coil of a dracolich spine. Powerful binding magics still remain within it making it hum softly with power.

Item.Name: dark shield night
Item.LongDescription: a dark shield lies on the ground absorbing light.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark Evil Invisibility Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove

Item.Name: scroll paper
Item.ShortDescription: a blood stained piece of paper
Item.LongDescription: a piece of paper with bloody hand writing lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Scratchy and staggered writing has been put down in someone's blood: "...then i was taken..o..a keep of great evil where creatures of.....watched over the other prisoners as we were tortured in the....those who finally maanged to die despite their collars where taken by great undead. "I know not what happened to them, but i believe they were used for experiments and as zombie... {there is a big mark of blood blotting out most of the page here} "...finally i escaped...a paladin of great strength found me dying and using the last of his divine rights he had me transported outside the keep...now i am dying, unable to move myself any ..." The writing stops here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: a shredded corpse lies here in a pool of it's own blood.

ExtraDescription.Description: Someone seems to have been doing some disgusting experiments on this poor body.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: a mangled corpse lies slumped in a corner.

ExtraDescription.Description: Someone seems to have been doing some disgusting experiments on this poor body.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: a burnt body lies here stinking up the room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Someone seems to have been doing some disgusting experiments on this poor body.

Item.Name: symbol servitude locket
Item.LongDescription: a strange locket with an unholy symbol lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This locket seems to be made of some type of strange material you have never seen before. Just looking at it makes you feel weaker, as if someone was trying to seduce you from afar. Close inspection, however, yields no visible use for the locket.

Item.Name: ring necromancy
Item.LongDescription: a black ring lies here

Item.Name: bone collar
Item.LongDescription: some cracked bones lie here strung loosely together.

ExtraDescription.Description: Some bones have been strung together to form a loose necklace.

Item.Name: fountain blood
Item.LongDescription: a stone fountain pours out blood in a steaming flow

ExtraDescription.Description: Warm thick blood squirts in streams into this stone fountain. The flow is small but continual, and you shudder to think where the supply comes from.

Item.Name: key bone
Item.LongDescription: a piece of bone has been carved into a key and left here.

Item.Name: well
Item.LongDescription: a dried, cracked stone well is here unused.

Item.Name: barrel
Item.LongDescription: a barrel dripping with blood is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The blood seems to be quite recently poured on the barrel, and in very liberal amounts.
a barrel drenched in blood lies here.

Item.Name: arm
Item.LongDescription: a torn off arm lies here.

Item.Name: head
Item.ShortDescription: a severd head of an elf
Item.LongDescription: a severed head of an elf is here.

Item.Name: leg
Item.LongDescription: a shredded leg lies here partly twitching.

Item.Name: flesh
Item.LongDescription: some bloody bits of flesh have been dropped here.

Item.Name: head
Item.LongDescription: a cracked head oozing blood has been thrown away and lies here decaying.

Item.Name: box
Item.LongDescription: a large box rests in a corner.

Item.Name: heart
Item.LongDescription: a torn out heart of some victim lies here.

Item.Name: head
Item.ShortDescription: a severed head of a man
Item.LongDescription: a severed head of a man lies here.

Item.Name: flesh
Item.LongDescription: some unidentifiable flesh lies here in a puddle of blood.

Item.Name: finger
Item.LongDescription: a burnt finger lying here is all that remains of some person.

Item.Name: fishing line rod
Item.LongDescription: a long corroded rod with a hook and sinker on it lies here.

Item.Name: black cabinet
Item.LongDescription: a dull black cabinet rests here.

Item.Name: blue potion
Item.LongDescription: a blue potion sits here waiting to be quaffed.

Item.Name: purple potion
Item.LongDescription: a purple potion sits here unused.

Item.Name: crate
Item.LongDescription: a large crate has been placed here.

Item.Name: box
Item.LongDescription: a large box has been placed here.

Item.Name: machine pieces
Item.LongDescription: pieces of some complex war machine have been packaged and left here.

Item.Name: material
Item.LongDescription: pieces of forge material have been packaged and left here.

Item.Name: tools
Item.LongDescription: some dwarven tools lie here waiting to be used.

Item.Name: warhammer hammer
Item.LongDescription: a large mean looking warhammer has been left here.

Item.Name: axe battleaxe
Item.LongDescription: a sharp battleaxe of fine make has been left here.

Item.Name: steel leggings
Item.LongDescription: some steel leggings have been dropped here.

Item.Name: steel helm
Item.LongDescription: a heavy looking steel helm has been dropped here.

Item.Name: suit plate
Item.LongDescription: some fine dwarven plate has been left here.

Item.Name: unmoving black cloak
Item.LongDescription: a black cloak lies untouched by the wind.

Item.Name: demon plate black scales
Item.LongDescription: some overlapping tough black scales lie here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: a key lies here.

Item.Name: flesh
Item.LongDescription: some decaying flesh twitches on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood NoRemove VisDeath

Item.Name: boat
Item.LongDescription: a rotting boat has been left tied to the pier.

Item.Name: desk
Item.LongDescription: an old wooden desk is here.

Item.Name: scroll papers
Item.LongDescription: some papers with scrawled handwriting on them are here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Scrawled, hurried handwriting tells a story of the village: ... The darkness came upon us from the eastern mountains. Dark and evil it was, total in it's domination of our small valley. Little could we do as it took first out homes then our lives. One by one we fell as the darkness overcame us and enfolded us in it's grasp..... I am one of the last to remain fighting, we are holed up in the town hall and are fighting as i write. I hope that someone can someday read this and seek vengeance upon the lord that resides somewhere in the mountains.... I believe that our valley is b eing used to transport prisoners to some place in the mountains where they are usd for unspeakable experiments, although for what i do not know. I must... The writing stops here as if the person was interupted.

Item.Name: silver cross
Item.LongDescription: a silver cross has been left here.

Item.Name: iron cabinet
Item.LongDescription: an iron cabinet rests here.

Item.Name: black flask
Item.LongDescription: a black flask of vile has been left here.

Item.Name: black flask
Item.LongDescription: a black flask of vile has been left here.

Item.Name: barrel ale
Item.LongDescription: a large barrel of ale has just been tapped and left.

Item.Name: inverted cross symbol dead
Item.LongDescription: an inverted cross of obsidian is here burning the floor.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Invisibility NoDrop NoRemove VisDeath

ExtraDescription.Description: This is an unholy symbol empowered to give it's wielder authority in the underworlds realms. Unfortunately it has no value in the mortal realms.

Item.Name: spiked gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: some spiked gauntlets lie here unused.

Item.Name: fur cloak
Item.LongDescription: a piece of warm fur has been shaped into a cloak and left here.

Item.Name: warhammer hammer
Item.LongDescription: a large mean looking warhammer has been left here.

Item.Name: steel leggings
Item.LongDescription: some steel leggings have been dropped here.

Item.Name: steel spiked helm
Item.LongDescription: a steel helm with sharp spikes has been dropped here.

Item.Name: suit plate
Item.LongDescription: some fine dwarven plate has been left here.

Item.Name: green sash
Item.LongDescription: a bit of long green cloth blows softly in the wind.

Item.Name: longbow unicorn
Item.ShortDescription: a longbow strung with unicorn hair
Item.LongDescription: a beautiful longbow strung with unicorn hair is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove

Item.Name: cavalier shield
Item.LongDescription: a fine shield with a dwarf knight's emblem is here.

Item.Name: adamantite hammer
Item.LongDescription: a fine hammer of adamantite laced with mithril is here.

Item.Name: blue orb
Item.LongDescription: a brilliant orb of blue light floats before you.

Item.Name: ring peacekeeper
Item.LongDescription: a ring with a dove carved into it lies here discarded.

Item.Name: crown thorns
Item.LongDescription: some blood stained thorns have been woven into a crown.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove

Item.Name: acid dragonscale
Item.LongDescription: some acid-etched dragonscales lie here.

Item.Name: ring service
Item.LongDescription: a ring thrums softly as if speaking to someone.

Item.Name: arborian chainmail
Item.LongDescription: some fine chainmail lies here unused.

Item.Name: arborian gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: some fine gauntlets lie here unused.

Item.Name: arborian leggings
Item.LongDescription: some fine leggings lie here unused.

Item.Name: copper bracelet
Item.LongDescription: a band of wide copper lies here.

Item.Name: ragonin
Item.LongDescription: a razor-sharp double-edged sword lies here.

Item.Name: whip fire
Item.LongDescription: a flaming length of cord lies here.

Item.Name: claws demon
Item.LongDescription: some twisted claws lie severed on the ground.

Item.Name: drow mask
Item.LongDescription: a mask of fine elven make lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: a mask of drow make seems to almost absorb light and hide what lies behind it.

Item.Name: ice icecold dagger
Item.LongDescription: an dagger coated in ice lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The steel of this dagger seems to hum as it freezes the air around it.

Item.Name: drow wakizashi
Item.LongDescription: a thin black sword of drow make lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This fine blade isn't much good as a weapon, but someone with good reflexes could easily use it to divert the blows of heavier weapons and at the same time sneak in their own strikes at their opponents unprotected sides.

Item.Name: ice dragon claw
Item.LongDescription: a huge claw covered in ice has been left here.

Item.Name: black spiked collar
Item.LongDescription: a black collar with spikes around it's edges lies here.

Item.Name: staff shephard
Item.LongDescription: a rotting old staff has been left here to decay.
